section_title:
22g18. Deductions for cash register shortages, damages and loss of
equipment.
text:
Deductions
from an otherwise exempt employee’s salary may not be made for cash register
shortages, damages or loss of company equipment.  Deductions may be made only
for the reasons stated in 29 CFR § 541.602(b). WHD
Opinion Letter FLSA 2006-07
